messages.text: What is there in terms of global climate models that can be run on a single compter without a GPU for 20+ years in a matter of days?

Hi Jo, are you talking about Julia implementations?  Or does any coding language work?  Most (if not all?) comprehensive global climate models are run in Fortran or C I believe.  What sort of climate model are you looking at?  Idealized/simple climate models or the more complex atmospheric and earth-system models?
